title: Patrick Lefevere: Quick-Step Is Strong Enough for Evenepoel’s Tour de France Ambitions
content:
'We have a team that can deliver him in the best way. I know many doubt that, but I like to be underestimated.' Quick-Step vows to come out swinging in Evenepoel's Tour debut.

Read the full article at Patrick Lefevere: Quick-Step Is Strong Enough for Evenepoel’s Tour de France Ambitions on Velo.
author: sstokes
